mapper.select: select fstv_no, fstv_title from festival where fstv_startdate <= current_date() and fstv_enddate >= current_date() order by fstv_startdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booths (booth_name, fstv_no, booth_addr, booth_image, booth_tel, booth_hours, booth_category, booth_introduction) VALUES (#{boothName}, #{fstvNo}, #{boothAddr}, #{boothImage}, #{boothTel}, #{boothHours}, #{boothCategory}, #{boothIntroduction})
